Shockwave:



Shockwave didn't acknowledge Black Arachnia.  Her words were unimportant.  He 
nodded to Rampage though.  "Very well, let us go." he intoned, transforming 
into his space fighter mode, launching into the air towards the battle 
between Killfest and Megatron, keeping at a pace that would allow the minions 
below him to follow.
